snippet: A case in the Milwaukee area is part of a wave of lawsuits against weapons sellers that accuse them of knowingly permitting illegal sales or of being grossly negligent.
abstract: Adam J Allan and Milton Beatovic, former owners of Wisconsin gun store Badger Guns, are facing charges of knowingly permitting illegal gun sale to 18-year-old Julius Burton, through what is commonly known as a straw purchase; Burton later shot two police officers with the weapon; case is part of new wave of lawsuits around country that focus on gun dealer’s obligation to spot straw purchases, common way guns enter underground market.
lead_paragraph: A case in the Milwaukee area is part of a wave of lawsuits against weapons sellers that accuse them of knowingly permitting illegal sales or of being grossly negligent.

headline.main: Trial in Wisconsin Tests Gun Store’s Judgment on Illegal Sales
headline.print_headline: Trial in Wisconsin Tests Gun Store’s Judgment on Illegal Sales

keywords.value: Brew City Shooter's Supply (Milwaukee, Wis, Retailer)
